original_text:
The people who live in Samaria fear
    for the calf-idol of Beth Aven.
Its people will mourn over it,
    and so will its idolatrous priests,
those who had rejoiced over its splendor,
    because it is taken from them into exile.
korean_text: 사마리아 주민이 벧아웬의 송아지로 말미암아 두려워할 것이라 그 백성이 슬퍼하며 그것을 기뻐하던 제사장들도 슬퍼하리니 이는 그의 영광이 떠나감이며

sentences.original_text: The people who live in Samaria fear
for the calf-idol of Beth Aven
Its people will mourn over it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 백성들이 그것을 위해 애통할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and so will its idolatrous priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우상 숭배하는 제사장들도 그럴 것이다

sentences.original_text: those who had rejoiced over its splendor
because it is taken from them into exile
